alert.note: Alert for Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 12:03PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Geneva, northern Walton and western Holmes Counties through 1245 PM CDT... At 1202 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Laurel Hill to near De Funiak Springs to 8 miles east of Eglin Air Force Base. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Liberty, Paxton, Ponce De Leon, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Gaskin, Alpine Heights, Darlington, Arrant Settlement, De Funiak Spring Airport, Rock Hill, Glendale, Pleasant Ridge, Center Ridge, Hickory Hill, New Harmony and Piney Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
